title: Creamy Curried Vegetable Soup
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '1 onion, chopped', '1 clove garlic, finely chopped', '1 tablespoon curry powder', '1 litre chicken stock', '650g mixed vegetables, chopped', '2 tablespoons plain flour', '500ml skimmed milk', 'salt and pepper to taste']
